function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential for disease transmission in high-traffic areas like hallways and atria due to close proximity and frequent contact between individuals.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air filtration in classrooms and office spaces may increase the concentration of airborne pathogens, leading to higher risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices in restrooms and building support areas can facilitate the transmission of infectious agents through surface contact.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bacterial communities in dust collected from 155 spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thin building design allowing most rooms access to outside air directly through windows and louvers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Central atrium used for exhausting air through stack ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding how building design influences indoor microbiome","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in indoor bacterial communities based on building design choices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding how different building functions and space types influence indoor microbiome","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased growth of bacteria and fungi in areas with higher humidity and water sources","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dispersal of microbes into and within the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear relative importance of different sources of indoor microbes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases through the built environment microbiome","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the link between design and the microbiology of the indoor environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited research focused on biological processes shaping indoor ecosystems and their impact on human health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalization due to survey conduct in only one location cyprus .","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of prior research on tendency and awareness towards fake news.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unexplored social media use of recovered covid-19 cases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference in social media use during covid-19 compared to normal times.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of fake news and misinformation on social media during the pandemic leading to increased anxiety and panic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased impact of decision-making based on social media discussions, leading to potential resistance to official decisions.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Motivated by collectivist interests, social media use during the pandemic differs from normal times, focusing on survival and shared concerns.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exaggerated panic related to covid-19 due to social media posts","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of fake news related to covid-19 on social media","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of social media on decision-makers leading to frequent changes in proposed legislation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High social media use during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information sharing about recoveries from covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased isolation leading to permanent psychological disorders","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low environmental and personal hygiene awareness due to social media","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exaggeration and panic related to covid-19 due to social media","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited use of social media for support during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive impact on hygiene behavior from social media","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for covid-19 information","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of fake news related to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of social media on psychological well-being","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Circulation of the questionnaire on social media platforms may lead to a lack of representativeness in the respondent sample, risking biased results.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High frequency of social media use for following recent news may lead to exposure to misinformation and rumors about covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High reliance on social media for communication and decision making may lead to echo chambers and confirmation bias, influencing public perception of covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of individuals without internet access from the research may lead to a biased representation of the population’s social media use during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of physical data collection due to lockdown may limit the scope and accuracy of the research findings.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of standardized questions related to covid-19 may affect the consistency and comparability of the survey data.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased social media use due to covid-19 related news and anxiety.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on social media for healthcare support and information.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prediction of user behaviors and panic-related searches on google trends.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of fake news creating panic and anxiety","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social media use leading to anxiety and psychological problems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fast publishing of unfinished or unobserved research during covid-19 leading to circulation of fake news","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive transmission of fake news over social media creating chaos and stress","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of official logos in fake news","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
